basics.name: Semen Molokanov
basics.label: Web developer
summary: I am a software developer with eight years experience in programming. My experience in Ruby on Rails is three years. Throughout this time I have participated in several complex and challenging projects such as CRM system for media holding and trade platform for healthcare industry with a focus on smart data analysis.

Currently I work for the company Mynewsdesk in the position of senior developer.  I do all my best to add value to a product and to support other team members. I am a self-motivated developer and able to solve complex problems on my own. I am striving to expand my professional expertise and skillset to keep up to date with technology.

work.summary: International PR and marketing platform. Ruby on Rails.
highlights: Solved critical business problem related to the application search. Reconfigured the misusage of Solr search engine for text attributes and changed it to PostgreSQL full-text search.
Made a vast contribution to the technical design and implementation for most of the project features implemented within my team.
Switched YAML parser from Syck to Psych during ruby upgrade to 2.2.3 without downtime and data loss.
Performed bulk of the work to upgrade Rails version from 3.2 to 4.0 and Rspec from 2.x to 3.0.
work.achievement: since I joined Mynewsdesk, my team became the most productive one in the company based on the latest release.

work.summary: Trade platform for healthcare industry, mobile application API. Ruby on Rails, Grape.
highlights: Developed integration with head office database and suppliers` applications.
Implemented complex business logic for searching products in legacy database.

work.summary: Web-based CRM system. Ruby on Rails.
highlights: Developed CRM system business logic, with focus on facilitating the work of managers.
Integration with other applications in IT department.
Implemented click-to-call service based on Asterisk and WebSockets highly integrated to business processes.
Developed tools for reporting and data marts generation.
work.achievement: reduced expenses and increased productivity of managers daily business, high customers satisfaction and continuous successful functioning of the system.

highlights: Various Internet projects development and management.
Search engine optimization of clients` and own Internet projects.
work.achievement: high customer satisfaction, increased the clients' sales level and brand recognition.

work.summary: Desktop applications for SEO specialists. Delphi.
highlights: Applications' design and development: architecture, GUI, business logic.
work.achievement: over 15,000 licenses of the programs were sold on Russian market, product launch on European market is planned in the future.

education.institution: The Ural State University named after A.M. Gorky, Ekaterinburg, Russia
summary: Education in the fields of solid state physics, low temperature physics and computer physics. Computer modelling of physical processes. Programming real time application.
